title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 109.6 - Judicial review
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 109.6 - Judicial review

State Regulations

Any determination made by the authority pursuant to this
section which prevents the commencement of the time in which interest will be
paid shall be subject to judicial review in a proceeding pursuant to article 78
of the Civil Practice Law and Rules. Such proceedings shall only be commenced
in the absence, or upon the completion, of other review procedures specified in
the contract or by regulation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
109.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
